name: cursor-ios-simulator-connect
description: Direct MCP tooling for controlling the iOS Simulator via Apple accessibility APIs.
author: Anysphere, Inc.

cursor.iosSimulator.enabled.description: Enable iOS Simulator MCP tools for agent interaction with iOS apps (macOS only)

cursor.iosSimulator.dockedView.fps.description: Target frame rate for the docked simulator view (5-60 FPS)
